component.name: resetPassword
component.description: Reset Password for Salesforce account for a specific User.

component.name: setPassword
component.description: Set new password for Salesforce account for a specific User.

component.name: getUserPasswordExpirationStatus
component.description: Gets a user’s password expiration status based on the specified user ID

component.name: returnHeadersForUserPassword
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by sending a GET request to the sObject User Password resource.

component.name: getSelfServiceUserPasswordExpirationStatus
component.displayName: Get Self-Service User Password Expiration Status
component.description: Retrieves a self-service user’s password expiration status based on the specified user ID.

component.name: resetSelfServiceUserPassword
component.description: Reset Password for Salesforce account for a specific self-service.

component.name: returnHeadersForSelfServiceUserPassword
component.displayName: Return Headers For Self-Service User Password
component.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by sending a GET request to the sObject Self-Service User Password resource.

component.name: setSelfServiceUserPassword
component.description: Sets a self-service user’s password using the specified user ID.
